0: A measure that would require porn performers to wear condoms while filming in Los Angeles County was approved by voters. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The measure garnered 55.9% of the vote after a hard-fought campaign, NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "This is a major referendum on the subject of safer sex," said AIDS Healthcare Foundation President Michael Weinstein. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The measure is sponsored by the foundation, which has been pushing for years to protect adult-film performers from HIV and other sexually transmitted diseases. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Under the measure, the cost of the law would be paid for by porn producers, who would have to purchase a public health permit, much like tattoo parlors. Violators would be subject to fines and misdemeanor criminal charges. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Weinstein said the question now is whether the adult-film industry and the county government will cooperate. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "We have shown our resolve that we are not going to give up on this issue," he said.
